content: Immidiate Incident Response and Much More
Your exclusive access card to a digital bodyguard, protecting your data from online threats

limpidBoxes.text: Reclaim Your Peace of Mind, knowing that the SecDesk VIP team of security experts has your back 24/7.
Contact us anytime and the SecDesk VIP team will quickly eliminate your security troubles, ensuring that your assets are safe and secure.
If we need your input, our team will contact you with comprehensive step by step instructions.
Security concerns can be overwhelming to deal with, we filter out the unnecessary notifications, presenting only the critical ones to you.
Our 100% discrete policy ensures that your information is safe with us bound by a one-sided Non-Disclosure Agreement.
We are Fast, Adaptable and Proactive which means that whenever you have a security concern, we are just fingertips away from addressing it.

carouselCurrentSubscription.title: What we’re offering in the current subscription

cardProps.title: Understanding Terms and Conditions
cardProps.description: Tired of deciphering dense legal jargon? We've got you covered. Our platform provides easily digestible summaries of terms and conditions, so you can understand exactly what you're getting yourself into.

cardProps.title: Helpdesk
cardProps.description: Need assistance navigating the complexities of cybersecurity? Our helpdesk is here to lend a helping hand. Reserve a 30-minute call with our security experts and get answers to all your burning security questions.

cardProps.title: Leaked Credentials
cardProps.description: Safeguard your online accounts and check whether your credentials have leaked on the internet. Whether it's a password leak or a data breach, our system keeps a watchful eye on the web, ensuring that you're always one step ahead of cyber threats.

cardProps.title: Online Training
cardProps.description: Led by industry experts, our courses cover a wide range of security-related subjects, providing you with the knowledge and skills needed to stay safe online. Access our online trainings anytime, anywhere, and learn at your own pace.

cardProps.title: Is this Legit?
cardProps.description: Worried about falling victim to online scams? Put your doubts to rest with our legitimacy verification service. Simply submit the website or service in question to our system, and our experts will conduct a thorough assessment to determine its authenticity.

carouselUpcomingSubscription.title: That’s not all folks!
carouselUpcomingSubscription.description: We are still building hard to get you ever more secure, we can’t tell you everything yet, we can tell you however: during your subscription you get access to all newly added services for free and even get an early sneak peek if you like!

cardProps.title: Closely Monitor Image Sharing
cardProps.description: Keep a vigilant eye on who shares your private images with our cutting-edge monitoring system. Protect your personal and sensitive photos from unauthorized sharing by logging every instance of image sharing.

cardProps.title: DMCA/GDPR Requests
cardProps.description: Take control of your private data with our streamlined DMCA and GDPR request management system. Whether you need to file a takedown request or respond to one, we've got you covered. Safeguard your personal information now!

cardProps.title: Growing Collection of Training
cardProps.description: Stay ahead of emerging threats and enhance your cybersecurity knowledge with our ever-expanding collection of security-related trainings. From basic privacy practices to advanced threat detection techniques, we offer comprehensive resources to help you protect yourself online.

cardProps.title: Privacy Shop
cardProps.description: Explore our exclusive Privacy Shop and find the perfect gadgets and gifts to safeguard your digital privacy. From NFC protectors to webcam covers, USB data blockers, and more, we offer a curated selection of high-quality products made for your security.

cardProps.title: Subscribe for Updates
cardProps.description: Don't miss out on the latest developments in privacy and security – subscribe to our updates today! By subscribing, you'll gain access to exclusive content, product announcements, and valuable insights delivered straight to your inbox.

imageSlider.whatItIsForText: Secdesk VIP provides precision-engineered security solutions designed exclusively for industry leaders who cannot avoid the spotlight. Sign up if you are:
bulletPoints: A Social Influencer, Unaware of the Digital Target
A Crypto Millionaire, Unsure about Government Recourse
A C-Suite Executive, with Unprotected Personal Assets
An Ultra High Net Worth Individual, with Reputations to Uphold
Living in an Oppressive Regime, and Don't Trust the Government
imageSlider.imageSliderText: If you seek freedom from digital anxiety, SecDesk VIP is your ultimate protector.

digitalBodyGaurdSection.badgeText: YOUR DIGITAL SECURITY MATTERS A LOT
digitalBodyGaurdSection.Title: Why Digital Bodyguards?
descriptionArray: The attacks against the industry leaders and people in the spotlight have become common, and the attackers are always on the lookout for a new target. Despite the dangers of the digital world at an all time high, it is exceptionally rare to find a team of digital bodyguards to safeguard your online security.

SecDesk VIP is a world class team of online security experts specialized in their fields, ready to become your digital bodyguards. Join the community of digitally secured elites protected by our VIP security expert team.

protectYourselfNow.title: Ready to Get Access to Your Digital Bodyguard?

itemArray.text: NDA: We sign a one-sided NDA, guaranteeing the complete non disclosure of your information. Every interaction, from intake to services, is safe with us and covered by the NDA.
INTAKE:  We conduct an intake session with you/ your team or your representative to discuss your wants, needs, concerns and situation.
PROPOSAL: Based on our intake session, we create a personalized proposal tailored to your needs. It is clear, complete, and transparent with no hidden costs down the line.
IMPLEMENTATION: Once you accept our proposal, you select a time for implementing the VIP security services and we will execute with precision.
MONITORING: Our expert security team monitors every potential alerts from our implemented services, notifying you and mitigating any critical security risks.
